    Reservoir sampling

    01 Mar 2015

    Morris traversal-traverse a binary tree without stack

    17 Dec 2014

    About morris traversal It aims at traversing an binary tree in inorder without using stack. The main idea: Create links to the successor(use leaf node's left or right null pointer) Print the data using these links Revert the changes to restore original tree.
